User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the SashaLeads AI application.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in the group chat.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

userName.description: The name of the user who sent the message.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the message was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Secured by user ID. Each user can only access their own profile.

/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores all group chat messages. All authenticated users can read and create messages.
